summary: After digging up a bizzarly mutilated corpse on her land, physician Tora Hamilton uncovers a lethal connection to ancient pagan rituals.
cast: Radha Mitchell|Rupert Graves|Ian McElhinney|David Robb|Hilary Rose|Liam Carney|Joanne Crawford|Conor Mullen|Peter Vollebregt|Lesa Thurman|Declan Conlon|Aron Hegarty|Deirdre Monaghan|Megan Riordan|Rachel Oliva|Bernadette Brown|Clare Barrett|Melissa Maria Carton|Paul Alan Walsh|Barry Dobson
keywords: falling to one's death|murder of a police officer|murder of a policewoman|woman in jeopardy|pagan
title: El sacrificio
